attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see what Trump 2020 was all about. I immediately noticed spam mail in my email account, spam calls, and spam notifications after I downloaded the app. I genuinely believe that this app could ruin my phone or other people phones. I would not recommend this app to anyone with a phone they would like to keep. Also immediately after I deleted the app, all of the spam mail and notifications where completely gone and off my phone. This app should be deleted from the Apple App Store.
attributes.title: This is spam

attributes.review: YA HEARD THE TITLE. THIS APP IS SO RATCHET 🥴🥴🥴🥴🥴🥴🥴🥴 FIRST OFF when i downloaded it on my phone, there was a super wonky glitch and my phone background changed to a photo of trump🤮🤮🤮🤮it was so bad i threw my phone across the room. it also downloaded w a bunch of other apps i never asked for such as the bible app, an app showing you the nearest gun store, and photos/videos of trump doing his thing on epstein’s island 🤮🤮🤮🤮 i never consented to this cult. when you open the app, FOR SOME REASON it causes the flashlight on ur phone to start blinking hella, almost gave me a seizure 😪😪😪 overall, trash app 0/10 never download this.
attributes.title: THIS APP SMELLS

attributes.review: As if the wait wasn’t long enough, (5 hours). The app seemed to have been hacked. There was misspelling, letters in random places, and little clown stickers popping in and out of the screen. I was so disappointed. This year I just turned 18 and I was really looking forward to voting for the one and only Donald Trump and learning more about how to make sure the republicans win again this year. Sadly I can’t do much on this app. You should probably check your system, because if you’re being hacked, a couple misspelt words isn’t all the hackers will do...
attributes.title: Sus

attributes.review: so it started off a sunny morning i decided to download the app😼i waited about 5 hours for the app to download. it was off to a terrible start but i waited just to see the annoying orange. i then proceed to open the app and my screen turns off. i try to turn my phone off but it doesn’t work. it seems too have been locked or something so i take my phone to apple and they manage to turn it on and tell me i have spam apps on my phone (this app). so i proceed to delete it and i have lived a better life till this day 😻
attributes.title: Absolutely atrocious

attributes.review: This app is the worst app I’ve ever downloaded. I downloaded this app to gain hope for the future again, but it just kicks me off of it because I make less than $50,000 a year and I’m a woman of color. Don’t even get me started on how long I took to download. 153 attempts and 3 days? An example of unprofessional actions. I expected better from the developer, and instead of getting information I get emails telling me that I’m fat, ugly, lonely, and will never be loved by anyone. My dogs sanity was compromised because of the noise coming from the opening page.
attributes.title: HIGE DISAPPOINTMENT

attributes.review: VERY VERY BAD APP, took 231 weeks to download. after it downloaded i got an email saying that trump wanted my address to make a surprise visit. i emailed back saying no, he then explained since i downloaded the app they automatically got all of my information including my email, phone number, social security number, address, blood type, bestfriends diary from 2014, my sisters pet chamaeleon’s dads name, & everything else. i was so scared. three days later trump showed up to my house & brutally murdered my pet mouse.... all because i downloaded his app.. PLEASE PLEASE do not download.
attributes.title: trump killed my pet mouse:(

attributes.review: i downloaded this app the other day only to find out that it took all of my data and made my phone extremely slow and it kept crashing! after i deleted the app, trump himself showed up at my doorstep, slapped me in the face, then stuck his finger up my nose and proceeded to say “i’m deporting you for deleting my app.” im writing this review from a hotel in russia trying to get back to america because the president deported me. i’m extremely worried about my kids and family. DO NOT download this app unless you want to have the worst week of your life.
attributes.title: MADE MY PHONE CRASH AND THEN GOT DEPORTED

attributes.review: guys i downloaded the app and as soon as i opened it stuff in my room started levitate😰!!! i’m really scared and then suddenly gabbie hanna came out of nowhere and said “point the finger, pull the trigger, throw them off your trail, you'll get yours e ven chull lee.” after that she started climbing on the walls😩😩!!! i thought i was finally safe, but then comes shane ye yaw😦. he was trying to steal my cat😢. when i asked why, he said, “it’s for an experiment.” good thing i was able to run him off by throwing a bottle of body wash at him😁. unless you want to go through traumatizing events, DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP. BE WARNED!! THIS IS FOR EVERYONE’S SAFETY!!!
attributes.title: DANGER!

attributes.review: this app is the worst thing to ever exist. i had downloaded it to see what the hype was all about but this ain’t no charli d’amelio.  the racist, sexist, and homophobic vibes are actually toxic and it killed my pet cat. if i could give it zero stars i would. this app ruined my life, my wife and kids left me because of this, i lost my job, money, and house. now i’m living in my aunts second husbands van along with his geckos. my credit score is 0 and i can no longer form coherent sentences. please remove this app from the app store so no other innocent people ever have to go through this.
attributes.title: RUINED MY ENTIRE LIFE

attributes.review: ok so i downloaded this app to support our AmZinG president. 🥰🥰 but when i downloaded it an ORANGE 🍊with eyes 👀 kept popping up like a jump scare!! 😟😮 it would scare the crap out of me (literally) 💩 SO NOW i have so much 💩 to clean up off the floor!!! (it’s EVERYWHERE😉) i’m am VERY angered 😡 by this!! u better FIX UR APP before i have my lawyers contact you and u will bring paying me A LOT of money 💵. i CANNOT believe this is happening right now!! ur supposed to be our PRESIDENT!! 🍊 now i won’t even have to take my laxative pills 💊 cause YOU already got all the 💩 out of me!!! FIX UR APP!!! 😡🤬😤🍊
attributes.title: i’ll be contacting my lawyers!! 🤬😉🍑🇺🇸❌🍊
